== About me ==
I'm a german BA student in his mid twenties. ''Ubuntu'' is my one and only operation system since Breezy.

=== Hardware ===
HP nx6125 Notebook:
* Mobile™ AMD Sempron-Prozessor 3100+ (1,8 GHz, 256 KB L2-Cache)
* DDR SDRAM, 333 MHz, 1280 MB
* ATI RADEON Express 200M Chipsatz
* HDD 80 GB (5.400 U/Min.), HDD 20 GB (5.400 U/Min.) (USB & TrueCrypt)
* 8x DVD+/-RW
* 15″ XGA (max. 1024 x 768)
* ATI MOBILITY RADEON X300 shared memory
* Broadcom 802.11b/g (BCM4318)
